short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open a separate window to parse and format JSON.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: is a lightweight Chrome extension that allows users to easily format and view JSON data in a readable structure. Simply paste your raw JSON, format it with a click of a button, and copy the formatted output. The extension also offers font size adjustment and line numbering to enhance readability, making it an essential tool for anyone working with JSON data.
